name: vscode-todo-highlight
description: highlight TODOs, FIXMEs, and any keywords, annotations...

todohighlight.isCaseSensitive.description: Specify whether the keywords are case sensitive or not

todohighlight.toggleURI.description: If the file path within the output channel not clickable, set this to true to toggle the path patten between `<path>#<line>` and `<path>:<line>:<column>`

todohighlight.keywords.description: An array of keywords, and their CSS to customise how they look. Any CSS color identifier is valid, plus a few others ...

color.description: The text color. Besides, you can play with all the string and boolean styling properties provied by VS Code API. See all available properties in [VSCode doc on DecorationRenderOptions](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions) section

backgroundColor.description: The text background color. See all available properties in [VSCode doc on DecorationRenderOptions](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions) section

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the ruler mark on the scroll bar. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations. See all available properties in [VSCode doc on DecorationRenderOptions](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions) section

pattern.description: The RegEx pattern to use for matching instead of the text value.REMEMBER to escapse the backslash if there's any in your regexp (using \\ instead of single backslash)

isWholeLine.description: if true, then the whole line is highlighted, not just the matching text.

todohighlight.keywordsPattern.description: Specify keywords via RegExp instead of `todohighlight.keywords` one by one. NOTE that if this present, `todohighlight.keywords` will be ignored. REMEMBER to escapse the backslash if there's any in your regexp (using \\ instead of single backslash).

todohighlight.defaultStyle.description: Default style for all customized keywords

color.description: The text color. See all available properties on VSCode doc DecorationRenderOptions section: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api

backgroundColor.description: The text background color. See all available properties on VSCode doc DecorationRenderOptions section: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the ruler mark on the scroll bar. See all available properties on VSCode doc DecorationRenderOptions section: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api

todohighlight.include.description: Glob patterns that defines the files to search for. Only include files you need, DO NOT USE `{**/*.*}` for both performance and to avoid binary files.

anyOf.description: A glob pattern that defines the files to search for. Only include files you need, DO NOT USE `**/*.*` for both performance and to avoid binary files.

todohighlight.exclude.description: Glob pattern that defines files and folders to exclude while listing annotations.

anyOf.description: A glob pattern that defines files and folders to exclude while listing annotations
